name: Upside-Ways
description:
Upside-Ways is a little platformer and puzzle game, made for the Untitled Game Jam#29. 

In this game you control a character who can change its appearance in order to modify the gravity.

I strongly recommand you to do the tutorial, before playing. 

You can change the shortcut in the options, in the bottom right corner of the title screen.

Have fun playing this game !
